span.description: The number of rasters occupied by the column

offset.description: The number of rasters that the column is offset

direction.description: Layout Direction can be selected as row column
direction.description_zh: 布局方向 可选值为 row column

justify.description_zh: 主轴排列方式 可选值为 `flex-start` `flex-end` `center` `space-around` `space-between`

align.description: Cross Axis Arrangement The selectable values are 'stretch', 'center', 'flex-start', 'flex-end' baseline
align.description_zh: 交叉轴排列方式 可选值为 `stretch` `center` `flex-start` `flex-end` baseline

xs.description: '<768px' is the number of responsive rasters or raster attribute objects
xs.type: string | number | { span?: number | string, offset?: number | string }
xs.description_zh: `<768px` 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象

sm.description: '≥768px' is the number of responsive raster or raster attribute objects
sm.type: string | number | { span?: number | string, offset?: number | string }
sm.description_zh: `≥768px` 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象

md.description: '≥992px' is the number of responsive rasters or raster attribute objects
md.type: string | number | { span?: number | string, offset?: number | string }
md.description_zh: `≥992px` 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象

lg.description: '≥1200px' is the number of responsive raster or raster attribute objects
lg.type: string | number | { span?: number | string, offset?: number | string }
lg.description_zh: `≥1200px` 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象

xl.description: '≥1920px' is the number of responsive rasters or raster attribute objects

xl.description_zh: `≥1920px` 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象
